properties.name: Anarak District, Nain County, Isfahan Province, Iran
properties.description:
Anarak District, Nain County, Isfahan Province, Iran

Type: 118

Location: Iran

Anarak District (Persian: بخش انارک) is a district (bakhsh) in Nain County, Isfahan Province, Iran. The district has one city: Anarak. The District has one rural district (dehestan): Chupanan Rural District.

Location: Iran
